name: One man, one house, one city
name_original: One man, one house, one city
description:
This is an experimental text adventure game, we made it at the end of 2016, in about 2 weeks.

It was written as a farewell to 2016, a difficult time for many. But also as a prediction of what's to come, in the next a few years.

My writing or imagination might be lacking, but I hope my feeling towards these matters do come across.

And the good thing about video game: story doesn't need to move in a linear fashion. So you can experience multiverse without a FTL engine.

Anyway, I shall leave the game to you, and wish you the best of luck in 2017!

一人一房一城市

这是一款试验性的文字冒险游戏，创作于2016年底，花了大约2周时间完成。

最初创作这款游戏，是想向2016说声再见：一段艰难的时光，对于不少人而言。这款作品后来演变成对未来几年的一些预测。

我的写作能力与想象力或许一般，但我希望本作能传达我对这些事件的看法。

通过游戏表达的好处是：故事不需要线性前进。无需超光速引擎，我们就能体验多重宇宙。

闲话就此打住，让我把游戏留给玩家你，并祝你2017年一切顺利！
